name: One Touch Login by Phone
description: This API is used to send one time password to a given phone number for a frictionless login/registration.

Post Parameters.name: g-recaptcha-response
Post Parameters.description: Pass the acknowledgement received by Google in Google recaptcha authorisation process.

Post Parameters.name: qq_captcha_ticket
Post Parameters.description: Pass QQ Captcha ticket received from QQ in the QQ Captcha authorization process.

Post Parameters.name: qq_captcha_randstr
Post Parameters.description: Pass the value of the user's random string retrieved from the QQ captcha.

Post Parameters.name: Note
Post Parameters.description: Either you need to pass 'g-recaptcha-response' or 'qq_captcha_ticket' and 'qq_captcha_randstr' as per your configurations.
